name: My Daily Routine
description:
Hi all!

This is a Sloyd's 2nd Jam game

This is a interpretation of my daily routine work-home with insomnia issues, I have to sleep but everytime I'm jumping over it and continue to do other things, you'll understand it in the game. 

By the way this is a gameplayless walk sim, just walk, listen and watch )

--------------------------

If you want to change graphic settings, it is in Windows\JAM_2\Saved\Config\Windows 

- GameUserSettings.ini 0=low 3=epic
